Package com.multi_threaded_http_web_server

Class HTTPRequest

java.lang.Object
com.multi_threaded_http_web_server.HTTPRequest
public final class HTTPRequest
extends Object
The HTTPRequest class that handles, parses, and extract all the information related to the client's HTTP request.
Author:
Hodaifa98.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    HTTPRequest​(String request_line, ArrayList<String> http_request)
    Main HTTPRequest constructor.
    HTTPRequest​(String request_line, ArrayList<String> http_request, String content)
    HTTPRequest constructor in the case of a request that contains any sent content.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    HashMap<String,​String> extractGETParameters()
    Use a parsing method to extract GET parameters and their values from the HTTP request's GET query string.
    HashMap<String,​String> extractPOSTContent()
    Use a parsing method to extract content parameters from the HTTP request's content header.
    String getGET_query_string()
    Get the HTTP request content parameters, extracted in the case of a GET request.
    HTTP_Method getHttp_method()
    Get the HTTP request method used by the client to make a request to server.
    String getHttp_version()  
    String getRequest_content()
    Get the HTTP request content in the form of headers=values.
    HashMap<String,​String> getRequest_headers()  
    String getRequest_line()
    Get the HTTP request line in the form of: HTTP_METHOD /RESOURCE HTTP_VERSION.
    String getRequest_meme_type()
    Get the HTTP request MEME type associated with the requested resource.
    String getRequested_resource()
    Get the requested resource (file) from the server, or "/" if the request is the index page.
    String toString()  

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • HTTPRequest

      public HTTPRequest​(String request_line, ArrayList<String> http_request)
      Main HTTPRequest constructor.
      Parameters:
      request_line - The HTTP request line.
      http_request - The HTTP request headers and body.

    • HTTPRequest

      public HTTPRequest​(String request_line, ArrayList<String> http_request, String content)
      HTTPRequest constructor in the case of a request that contains any sent content.
      Parameters:
      request_line - The HTTP request line.
      http_request - The HTTP request headers and body.
      content - The HTTP request sent data (content).

  • Method Details

    • getRequest_line

      public String getRequest_line()
      Get the HTTP request line in the form of: HTTP_METHOD /RESOURCE HTTP_VERSION.
      Returns:
      The HTTP request line as a string.

    • getHttp_method

      public HTTP_Method getHttp_method()
      Get the HTTP request method used by the client to make a request to server.
      Returns:
      An HTTP Method enum value .

    • getRequested_resource

      public String getRequested_resource()
      Get the requested resource (file) from the server, or "/" if the request is the index page.
      Returns:
      The requested resource from the server.

    • getHttp_version

      public String getHttp_version()
      Returns:
      The HTTP version used by the client in its request.

    • getRequest_headers

      public HashMap<String,​String> getRequest_headers()
      Returns:
      A HashMap of the request headers and their values.

    • getRequest_meme_type

      public String getRequest_meme_type()
      Get the HTTP request MEME type associated with the requested resource.
      Returns:
      The request MEME type.

    • getRequest_content

      public String getRequest_content()
      Get the HTTP request content in the form of headers=values.
      Returns:
      The request content header.

    • getGET_query_string

      public String getGET_query_string()
      Get the HTTP request content parameters, extracted in the case of a GET request.
      Returns:
      The request parameters.

    • extractGETParameters

      public HashMap<String,​String> extractGETParameters()
      Use a parsing method to extract GET parameters and their values from the HTTP request's GET query string.
      Returns:
      A HashMap of GET parameters and their values.

    • extractPOSTContent

      public HashMap<String,​String> extractPOSTContent()
      Use a parsing method to extract content parameters from the HTTP request's content header.
      Returns:
      A HashMap of posted content parameters and their values.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The string representation of a HTTPRequest instance.
